moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of raising the user’s Attack.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Bend but Don’t Break!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Sharply raises the user’s Speed.

passives.name: Arresting Glare 1
passives.description: Has a small chance of lowering the target’s Speed when the user is hit by a physical attack move.

passives.name: Backfire 2
passives.description: Sharply lowers the Attack and Sp. Atk of all opposing sync pairs just before the user faints.
